targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ", " ORDER BY origin ASC) AS origins
FROM ${dataset}.revisions
WHERE id="${id}" AND origin LIKE ${origin}

SELECT DISTINCT git_repository_url, git_repository_branch, ANY_VALUE(git_commit_name) AS git_commit_name
FROM ${dataset}.revisions
WHERE id="${id}" AND origin LIKE ${origin}
GROUP BY git_repository_url, git_repository_branch

/* Massage */
SELECT
    id,
    git_commit_hash,
    CASE valid WHEN true THEN 1 WHEN false THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    description,
    IF(discovery_time IS NULL, "", CAST(discovery_time AS STRING)) AS discovery_time_str,
    IF(log_url IS NULL, "", "File") as log_url_text,
    log_url,
    misc
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        id,
        ANY_VALUE(git_commit_hash) AS git_commit_hash,
        ANY_VALUE(valid) AS valid,
        ANY_VALUE(description) AS description,
        ANY_VALUE(discovery_time) AS discovery_time,
        ANY_VALUE(log_url) AS log_url,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT misc, "\n") AS misc
    FROM ${dataset}.revisions
    WHERE id="${id}" AND origin LIKE ${origin}
    GROUP BY id
)

/* Count */
SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IF(valid, "PASS", "FAIL") AS metric,
    COUNT(id) AS value
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.valid) AS valid,
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.tests AS tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
    WHERE
        revision_id = ${id:json} AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
    GROUP BY id
)
GROUP BY valid
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    architecture AS metric,
    COUNT(id) AS value
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.architecture) AS architecture,
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.tests AS tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
    WHERE
        builds.revision_id = ${id:json} AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture} AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        NOT builds.valid
    GROUP BY id
)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10

/* Count */
SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    status AS metric,
    COUNT(id) AS value
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        tests.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(tests.status) AS status
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds, ${dataset}.tests AS tests
    WHERE
        revision_id = ${id:json} AND
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        tests.waived = FALSE
    GROUP BY tests.id
)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    config_name AS metric,
    COUNT(id) AS value
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.config_name) AS config_name,
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.tests AS tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
    WHERE
        builds.revision_id = ${id:json} AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name} AND
        NOT builds.valid
    GROUP BY id
)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IF(LENGTH(compiler) > 32, CONCAT(SUBSTR(compiler, 1, 31), "…"), compiler) AS metric,
    COUNT(id) AS value
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.compiler) AS compiler,
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.tests AS tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
    WHERE
        builds.revision_id = ${id:json} AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        NOT builds.valid
    GROUP BY id
)
WHERE compiler IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

/* Massage */
SELECT
    id,
    origin,
    architecture,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(compiler, "^(.{48}).+$", "\\1…") AS compiler,
    config_name,
    IF(start_time is NULL, "", CAST(start_time AS STRING)) as start_time_str,
    IF(duration is NULL, "", FORMAT_TIME("%H:%M:%E3S", TIME_ADD(TIME "00:00:00", INTERVAL CAST((duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND))) as duration_str,
    description,
    valid_num,
    tests_status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate and join */
    SELECT
        builds.id AS id,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.origin) AS origin,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.architecture) AS architecture,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.compiler) AS compiler,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.config_name) AS config_name,
        MIN(builds.start_time) AS start_time,
        MIN(builds.duration) AS duration,
        ANY_VALUE(builds.description) AS description,
        MIN(CASE builds.valid WHEN true THEN 1 WHEN false THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS valid_num,
        MAX((CASE tests.status WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE tests.waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) as tests_status_num
    FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.tests AS tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
    WHERE
        revision_id = "$id" AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
        IFNULL(builds.start_time >= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__from}) AND builds.start_time <= TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(${__to}), TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
    GROUP BY id
    ORDER BY start_time ASC
)

SELECT *
FROM UNNEST((
  SELECT ANY_VALUE(patch_mboxes)
  FROM ${dataset}.revisions
  WHERE id = "${id}" AND origin LIKE ${origin}
))
WITH OFFSET as idx
ORDER BY idx ASC
